question: ou have just moved into a new home and are planning to hold a party. You are worried that the noise may disturb your neighbour. Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letter introduce yourself describe your plans for the party invite your neighbor to come You do NOT need to write any addresses. You should write at least 150 words.
text: Hope this letter finds you in  good spirits and health. I am writing to inform you that I am going to organize a party in our building next week. I am planning to celebrate the party with the musical band. So, I am worried about the noise that may happen.

First, my name is Krunal Gandhi. I recently moved to this building as it is in proximity to my work area. I find the building and the surrounding area very pleasant as I came from a densely populated area. I am celebrating this party owing to the purchase of my new house.  The party will be started at 7:00p.m. A variety of dishes will be served to start from a welcome drink followed by the main course to dessert. In the main course, we have arranged special vegetarian and non-vegetarian food of Delhi i.e. butter chicken, Panner Patiala, Sahi Panner etc… which I am sure you would like most being a localize.
On this occasion, I am inviting you to join us and make the evening more cheerful. I look forward to seeing your presence at the party.
